casename: MeesPierson NV v Bay Pacific (S) Pte Ltd and Others
counsel: Muthu Arusu and Ang Wee Tiong (Allen & Gledhill) for the plaintiffs; L Devadason and Mahtani Bhagwandas (Mahtani & Co) for the defendants
tags-parsed: Banking/Letters of credit/Documents with defects/Whether presenter of documents presenting them with knowledge of defects
Banking/Letters of credit/Forged health certificate/Whether documents can be rejected if known at time of presentment to be forged
Civil Procedure/Costs/Defendant not involved in transaction at all, but having to defend action/Whether costs to be awarded on indemnity basis

Restitution/Mistake/Mistake of fact/Letters of credit/Forged document/Bank alleging payment made under mistake of fact/Presenter of documents innocent of fraud/Whether moneys bank can claim restitution of moneys paid
